Text: Isaac Asimov's Robots and Aliens:  The series follows the action of the novels of the "Isaac Asimov's Robot City" series, with the same protagonists Derec and Ariel, and many other characters.

Text: Isaac Asimov's Robots and Aliens:  The plot deals with the Three Laws and encounters between robots and different varieties of alien life.
